answer: The vacuum processing system is configured with multiple vacuum processing apparatus arranged in parallel, with all vacuum processing chambers of the apparatus aligned in a straight line. The arrangement of the vacuum processing chambers is at an acute angle with respect to the vacuum transfer chamber. The locking devices are provided symmetrically with respect to the axis passing through the center of the vacuum transfer chamber and the locking device, with two vacuum processing chambers positioned only on the opposite side of the locking device around the vacuum transfer chamber.
